__e: I asked why, and he said: "I'm out there lobbying to show that there's no demand for electric vehicles, "and you're out there proving me wrong."
They said that there was no demand for the car.
The demand for the security we offer is even greater than it was a year ago, which brings me to my next point.
They want to know what demand is.
Well, there is not much demand for cameos.
There's no time for anything else - the programme's so popular.
